Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that uses string and cups to send and receive sound.
The student can illustrate how the sound travels through the string from one cup to the other.
The student can show the two students communicating with each other using the string telephone from a distance.
The student can indicate how the device solves the problem of communicating over a long distance.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone, like the cups and string, in their drawing.
The student can demonstrate the importance of using the provided materials to build the device.
